001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.validator;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.table.TableReflectionUtil;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.util.AssertionUtil;
009import java.util.HashMap;
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.Map;
012import lombok.NoArgsConstructor;
013
014/**
015 * Implementation of {@link UiTableValidator} responsible for validating table data and elements.
016 *
017 * <p>This class provides methods for extracting table row values, table elements, and performing
018 * assertions on tables based on different validation targets.
019 *
020 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
021 */
022//todo check spring somehow as the others to add allure
023@NoArgsConstructor
024public class UiTableValidatorImpl implements UiTableValidator {
025
026   /**
027    * Logs the assertion target details for debugging purposes.
028    *
029    * @param data The assertion target data to be logged.
030    */
031   protected void printAssertionTarget(Map<String, Object> data) {
032      LogUi.extended("Validation target: [{}]", data.toString());
033   }
034
035   /**
036    * Validates the given table object against a set of assertions.
037    *
038    * <p>Extracts data based on the assertion target (row values, row elements, table values, or table elements),
039    * logs the validation target, and executes assertions on the extracted data.
040    *
041    * @param object     The table object to validate.
042    * @param assertions The assertions to apply.
043    * @param <T>        The expected type of assertion results.
044    * @return A list of assertion results indicating whether the validation passed or failed.
045    */
046   @Override
047   public <T> List<AssertionResult<T>> validateTable(final Object object, final Assertion... assertions) {
048      startValidation(assertions.length);
049
050      Map<String, T> data = new HashMap<>();
051
052      for (Assertion assertion : assertions) {
053         processAssertion((UiTablesAssertionTarget) assertion.getTarget());
054         switch ((UiTablesAssertionTarget) assertion.getTarget()) {
055            case ROW_VALUES -> {
056               data.put("rowValues", (T) TableReflectionUtil.extractTextsFromRow(object));
057               assertion.setKey("rowValues");
058            }
059            case ROW_ELEMENTS -> {
060               data.put("rowElements", (T) TableReflectionUtil.extractElementsFromRow(object));
061               assertion.setKey("rowElements");
062            }
063            case TABLE_VALUES -> {
064               List<?> rows = (List<?>) object;
065               List<List<String>> rowList = rows.stream().map(TableReflectionUtil::extractTextsFromRow).toList();
066               data.put("tableValues", (T) rowList);
067               assertion.setKey("tableValues");
068            }
069            case TABLE_ELEMENTS -> {
070               List<?> rows = (List<?>) object;
071               List<List<SmartWebElement>> rowList =
072                     rows.stream().map(TableReflectionUtil::extractElementsFromRow).toList();
073               data.put("tableElements", (T) rowList);
074               assertion.setKey("tableElements");
075            }
076            default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unsupported assertion target");
077         }
078      }
079
080      printAssertionTarget((Map<String, Object>) data);
081      return AssertionUtil.validate(data, List.of(assertions));
082   }
083
084
085   /**
086    * Logs the beginning of a validation process with a specified number of assertions.
087    *
088    * <p>This method provides an Allure step annotation for better test reporting
089    * and logs the validation start information using {@link LogUi}.
090    *
091    * @param assertionCount the number of assertions that will be performed
092    */
093   public void startValidation(int assertionCount) {
094      LogUi.info("Starting response validation with {} assertion(s).", assertionCount);
095   }
096
097   /**
098    * Logs and processes an assertion for a specified UI table target.
099    *
100    * <p>This method marks the assertion processing step in Allure reports
101    * and logs the assertion target using {@link LogUi}.
102    *
103    * @param target the UI table assertion target being processed
104    */
105   public void processAssertion(UiTablesAssertionTarget target) {
106      LogUi.info("Processing assertion for target: {}", target);
107   }
108
109}
